/* WtrSupMap.SelectWtrSupList 배수지 목록*/
WITH C AS ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS ROWCNT FROM INFOFMS.WTL_SERV_PS A WHERE 1=1
A.MNG_CDE = #MNG_CDE#
A.FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
A.HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE#
A.CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM#
A.SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM#
A.FNS_YMD >= decode(length(#FNS_YMD_FROM#), 10, to_char(to_date(#FNS_YMD_FROM#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '')
A.FNS_YMD <= decode(length(#FNS_YMD_TO#), 10, to_char(to_date(#FNS_YMD_TO#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '')
A.SAG_CDE LIKE '%' || #SAG_CDE# || '%'
A.SAG_CDE = #SAG_CDE#
A.SCW_CDE = #SCW_CDE#
A.PUR_NAM LIKE '%' || #PUR_NAM# || '%'
)
SELECT C.ROWCNT, X.* FROM (
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY A.FTR_IDN DESC ) AS RN , A.FTR_CDE , (SELECT FTR_NAM FROM INFOFMS.V_FTR_CDE WHERE FTR_CDE = A.FTR_CDE) AS FTR_NAM , A.FTR_IDN , A.HJD_CDE , (SELECT HJD_NAM FROM INFOFMS.CMT_ADAR_MA WHERE HJD_CDE = A.HJD_CDE) AS HJD_NAM , A.SHT_NUM , A.MNG_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250101' AND DTL_CD = A.MNG_CDE ) AS MNG_NAM , decode(length(A.FNS_YMD), 8, to_char(to_date(A.FNS_YMD, 'yyyyMMdd'), 'yyyy-MM-dd'), '') AS FNS_YMD , A.SRV_NAM , A.PUR_NAM , A.SAG_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250005' AND DTL_CD = A.SAG_CDE ) AS SAG_NAM , A.SRV_VOL , A.HGH_WAL , A.LOW_WAL , A.ISR_VOL , A.SUP_ARE , A.SUP_POP , A.SCW_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250052' AND DTL_CD = A.SCW_CDE ) AS SCW_NAM , A.CNT_NUM , A.SYS_CHK , A.SRV_ARA , CASE WHEN ST_ISVALID(A.GEOM) = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS IS_GEOMETRY FROM INFOFMS.WTL_SERV_PS A WHERE 1=1
A.MNG_CDE = #MNG_CDE#
A.FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
A.HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE#
A.CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM#
A.SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM#
A.FNS_YMD >= decode(length(#FNS_YMD_FROM#), 10, to_char(to_date(#FNS_YMD_FROM#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '')
A.FNS_YMD <= decode(length(#FNS_YMD_TO#), 10, to_char(to_date(#FNS_YMD_TO#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '')
A.SAG_CDE LIKE '%' || #SAG_CDE# || '%'
A.SAG_CDE = #SAG_CDE#
A.SCW_CDE = #SCW_CDE#
A.PUR_NAM LIKE '%' || #PUR_NAM# || '%'
ORDER BY FTR_IDN DESC
) X JOIN C ON 1=1 WHERE RN <= ($page$+1) * $rows$ AND RN >= ($page$) * $rows$ + 1

/* WtrSupMap.SelectWtrSupDtl 배수지 상세정보*/
SELECT A.FTR_CDE , (SELECT FTR_NAM FROM INFOFMS.V_FTR_CDE WHERE FTR_CDE = A.FTR_CDE) AS FTR_NAM , A.FTR_IDN , A.HJD_CDE , (SELECT HJD_NAM FROM INFOFMS.CMT_ADAR_MA WHERE HJD_CDE = A.HJD_CDE) AS HJD_NAM , A.SHT_NUM , A.MNG_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250101' AND DTL_CD = A.MNG_CDE ) AS MNG_NAM , A.FNS_YMD , A.SRV_NAM , A.PUR_NAM , A.SAG_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250005' AND DTL_CD = A.SAG_CDE ) AS SAG_NAM , A.SRV_VOL , A.HGH_WAL , A.LOW_WAL , A.ISR_VOL , A.SUP_ARE , A.SUP_POP , A.SCW_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250052' AND DTL_CD = A.SCW_CDE ) AS SCW_NAM , A.CNT_NUM , A.SYS_CHK , A.SRV_ARA , decode(A.SYS_CHK,'1','유','무') as SYS_CHK_NAM FROM INFOFMS.WTL_SERV_PS A WHERE 1=1 AND FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
statements.update: INSERT INTO INFOFMS.WTL_SERV_PS ( FTR_CDE , FTR_IDN , HJD_CDE , SHT_NUM , MNG_CDE , FNS_YMD , SRV_NAM , PUR_NAM , SAG_CDE , SRV_VOL , HGH_WAL , LOW_WAL , ISR_VOL , SUP_ARE , SUP_POP , SCW_CDE , CNT_NUM , SYS_CHK , SRV_ARA ) VALUES ( #FTR_CDE# , #FTR_IDN# , #HJD_CDE# , #SHT_NUM# , #MNG_CDE# , #FNS_YMD# , #SRV_NAM# , #PUR_NAM# , #SAG_CDE# , #SRV_VOL# , #HGH_WAL# , #LOW_WAL# , #ISR_VOL# , #SUP_ARE# , #SUP_POP# , #SCW_CDE# , #CNT_NUM# , #SYS_CHK# , #SRV_ARA# )

/* 배수지 상세 수정 */ UPDATE INFOFMS.WTL_SERV_PS SET HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE# , SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM# , MNG_CDE = #MNG_CDE# , FNS_YMD = #FNS_YMD# , SRV_NAM = #SRV_NAM# , PUR_NAM = #PUR_NAM# , SAG_CDE = #SAG_CDE# , SRV_VOL = #SRV_VOL# , HGH_WAL = #HGH_WAL# , LOW_WAL = #LOW_WAL# , ISR_VOL = #ISR_VOL# , SUP_ARE = #SUP_ARE# , SUP_POP = #SUP_POP# , SCW_CDE = #SCW_CDE# , CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM# , SYS_CHK = #SYS_CHK# , SRV_ARA = #SRV_ARA# WHERE FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#

MERGE INTO INFOFMS.WTL_SERV_PS USING DUAL ON (FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#)
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE# , SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM# , MNG_CDE = #MNG_CDE# , FNS_YMD = #FNS_YMD# , SRV_NAM = #SRV_NAM# , PUR_NAM = #PUR_NAM# , SAG_CDE = #SAG_CDE# , SRV_VOL = #SRV_VOL# , HGH_WAL = #HGH_WAL# , LOW_WAL = #LOW_WAL# , ISR_VOL = #ISR_VOL# , SUP_ARE = #SUP_ARE# , SUP_POP = #SUP_POP# , SCW_CDE = #SCW_CDE# , CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM# , SYS_CHK = #SYS_CHK# , SRV_ARA = #SRV_ARA#
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( FTR_CDE , FTR_IDN , HJD_CDE , SHT_NUM , MNG_CDE , FNS_YMD , SRV_NAM , PUR_NAM , SAG_CDE , SRV_VOL , HGH_WAL , LOW_WAL , ISR_VOL , SUP_ARE , SUP_POP , SCW_CDE , CNT_NUM , SYS_CHK , SRV_ARA ) VALUES ( #FTR_CDE# , #FTR_IDN# , #HJD_CDE# , #SHT_NUM# , #MNG_CDE# , #FNS_YMD# , #SRV_NAM# , #PUR_NAM# , #SAG_CDE# , #SRV_VOL# , #HGH_WAL# , #LOW_WAL# , #ISR_VOL# , #SUP_ARE# , #SUP_POP# , #SCW_CDE# , #CNT_NUM# , #SYS_CHK# , #SRV_ARA# )
/* 배수지 상세 삭제 */ DELETE INFOFMS.WTL_SERV_PS WHERE FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
